definition: hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan
second (unit of time)/arc second (angular measurement unit)/(coll.) instantly

sentences.english: For example, many operating systems measure time in units of tens of milliseconds.
sentences.chinese: 例如，许多操作系统以几十毫秒作为时间度量的单位。

sentences.english: If the test takes longer than the specified number of milliseconds to run, the test fails.
sentences.chinese: 如果测试运行的时间超过指定的毫秒数，则测试失败。

sentences.english: This is specified in milliseconds and is set to ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 它是以毫秒为单位的，我们将其设置为十分钟。

sentences.english: The grant map is dynamically re-calculated every few milliseconds.
sentences.chinese: 这个允许的地图是每一毫秒动态重计算的。

sentences.english: Flag capture time is reported with milliseconds.
sentences.chinese: 抢旗达阵的时间将以毫秒进行回报。

sentences.english: The opening time of the device mu- st be less than a few milliseconds.
sentences.chinese: 该装置应具有毫秒级的动作时间常数。

sentences.english: The gas-sampling valve needs only one millisecond to take a sample, before leaving the combustion chamber again.
sentences.chinese: 在离开燃烧室之前只需要一毫秒用来提取柴油取样阀。

sentences.english: Is the time of 50 to 70 milliseconds based on an estimate of the size of the dent?
sentences.chinese: 50到70毫秒这个估算是根据凹痕的大小作出的吗？

sentences.english: Evaluates an expression or calls a function every time a specified number of milliseconds elapses .
sentences.chinese: 我理解是每隔多少毫秒就执行一次。

sentences.english: Calculating time with millisecond precision follows the same idea.
sentences.chinese: 按照相同的想法，使用毫秒精度计算时间。

sentences.english: It encapsulates an instant in time with millisecond precision.
sentences.chinese: 它以毫秒级的精度封装时间上的某个瞬间时刻。

sentences.english: Then we'll analyse every millisecond of their facial behaviour and vocalisation .
sentences.chinese: 然后，我们会研究每一毫秒中他们的面部动作和声音。

sentences.english: The length of the fadeout, in milliseconds.
sentences.chinese: 声音渐消的时间长度，以毫秒计。

sentences.english: The servo expects to see a pulse every 20milliseconds (. 02 seconds).
sentences.chinese: 舵机的控制信号为每20毫秒一次的方波脉冲。

sentences.english: Animation duration in milliseconds for shade effect.
sentences.chinese: 以毫秒为单位的淡入淡出效果的动画时长。

sentences.english: If I'm running a quadratic algorithm, it'll take one millisecond to complete.
sentences.chinese: 算法会在1毫秒内完成，如果问题的复。

definition: nanosecond, ns, 10^-9 s (PRC)/Taiwan equivalent: 奈秒[nai4 miao3]
megabyte (2^20 or approximately a million bytes)
